title: What the rise of embedded finance means for online retailers - IBS Intelligence
content: What the rise of embedded finance means for online retailers  IBS Intelligence
description: The pandemic has been a great accelerator of existing digital trends, with none more evident than eCommerce. Global volumes of online transactions skyrocketed with global eCommerce sales growing by more than a quarter in 2020. During this massive shift, embedded financial solutions went from being an emerging novelty to a near-universal feature of online retail, [â€¦]
